means: 楚瓦什人（居住在前苏联西南部的人），楚瓦什语

sentence.Network_en: Chuvash dragons represent the pre - Islamic mythology of the same region.
sentence.Network_cn: 楚瓦士龙描述是与相同宗教中的先伊斯兰教神话部分相同的.

means.word_mean: 1. a member of a people of Turkic speech and Mongolian race living in the Volga region in eastern Russia
2. the Turkic language spoken by the Chuvash people

auth_sentence.content: Other minority languages include Ukrainian, Chuvash, Bashir, Mordvin, Circassian and Chechen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other minority languages include Ukrainian, Chuvash, Bashir, Mordvin, Circassian and Chechen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Other minority languages include Ukrainian, Chuvash, Bashir, Mordvin, Circassian and Chechen.

auth_sentence.content: We have Tatars, Bashkirs, Mordovs, Chuvash, Yakuts we have hundreds of ethnic groups inside Russia, and we have ethnic republics.
